// Pivot 0, 0
int flipperRight[4] = {
	3, 32,
	0, 40,
	0, 40,
	3, 32,
	52, 0,
	57, 0,
	67, 0,
	75, 7,
	75, 25,
	67, 33,
	21, 52,
	8, 53,
	0, 46,
	0, 40
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipperRight[4] = {
	0.040000f, 0.592593f,
	0.000000f, 0.740741f,
	0.000000f, 0.740741f,
	0.040000f, 0.592593f,
